content: I love this app and it is part of my every day tool kit along with physical equipment such as K2, REM POD, PSB7 etc. I have found this app complements my use of physical equipment very well indeed. It calibrates (both EMF and vibration) very well and is very stable on my Moto G6 and HTC M10. I can leave this running all night at home and hardly hear a peep out of it. When I use Vovilus II in an investigation it most often triggers a response in the same time frame as my other devices. In my opinion this app is a bargain for the price and genuinely works.
replyContent: Thank you John. You are correct. We actually make sure all of our apps work as well or better then actual Equipment for detecting EMF or Vibrations, simply because we have always been Investigators ourselves and want the best possible information from the spirits.

content: Love the app! Can u please implement a sweep rate for the words just in case spirits actually DO read. We'll be featuring this on our YT channel
replyContent:
This is a great Idea. I'm not sure why you gave us 3 stars if you love the app though. I added SWEEP RATE for everyone. ( + ) slows down the words and ( - ) speeds them up. There is also a Number setting located where the words are selected.
0 equals Fastest and 100 equals slowest.

content: I have been using this app for awhile now. It's extremely sensitive to the point of having to recalibrate all the time. The EMF DETECTION seems to work but only for a short time before you have to recalibrate it. The VIBRATION DETECTION is worthless. I've tried this on several sturdy tables, calibrated it and it still will not work correctly. Yes. I watched your YouTube video over and over and my opinion is you need to fine tune this app, and provide an update.
replyContent:
Devices have a ton to do with how the app works. Samsung devices seem to have the toughest time. We currently have a new calibration code for our Ghost Hunt 2020 that is fully automatic. I will work on implementing this into this app as well. 

Thank you

content: VBE Inc gets better and better
replyContent: Thank you. That is the only reason we make newer apps. We refuse to update any of our older apps years later as to avoid trusted apps malfunctioning on older devices, do to newer code not working on older android. However, if we have a new code that works better then prior. We create a new app to use that code with. Works out better for VBE users.
